com.iver.cit.gvsig.geoprocess.impl.dissolve.fmap
Interface ISpatialDissolveCriteria

All Known Implementing Classes:
AdjacencyDissolveCriteria
public interface ISpatialDissolveCriteria

Forces to IDissolveCriteria to fetch geometries from ReadableVectorial (for performance reasons, once a criteria has verified a spatial conditions, it caches IGeometry, to avoid reading them many times)

Author:
azabala
